name: Aura Armor
text: Activate only when an opponent's monster declares a direct attack while your Life Points are 2000 or less. Negate the attack, and Special Summon 1 "Player Token" (Warrior-Type/EARTH/Level 4/ATK ?/DEF ?). When that "Player Token" is Special Summoned, halve your Life Points. The ATK and DEF of "Player Token" are equal to your Life Points.
